html.p: Data Collection: Use Sophos Central SIEM Integration Add-on for collecting Sophos data.

search.query: `cs_sophos` | head 1 | stats count | eval data=if(count>0, "Data Present", "Data Not Present"), label="`cs_sophos`" | table label, data

`cs_sophos` type="Event::Endpoint::UpdateFailure::*" NOT type IN ("Event::Endpoint::UpdateFailure::UPDATED_SUCCESSFULLY", "Event::Endpoint::UpdateFailure::RESTART_NEEDED", "Event::Endpoint::UpdateFailure::RESTARTING") $tkn_host$ $tkn_dhost$ $tkn_user$ | stats count, latest(_time) as latest_event, values(name) as description, values(src_ip) as src_ip, values(suser) as user by host, dhost, type | eval latest_event=strftime(latest_event, "%F %T") | sort -count | `cs_sophos_update_errors_filter`

`cs_sophos` type="Event::Endpoint::OutOfDate" $tkn_host$ $tkn_dhost$ $tkn_user$ | stats count, latest(_time) as latest_event, values(src_ip) as src_ip, values(suser) as user by host, dhost | eval latest_event=strftime(latest_event, "%F %T") | sort -count | `cs_sophos_endpoint_outofdate_filter`

`cs_sophos` type="Event::Endpoint::CoreRestoreFailed" $tkn_host$ $tkn_dhost$ $tkn_user$ | stats count, latest(_time) as latest_event, values(name) as description, values(src_ip) as src_ip, values(suser) as user by host, dhost | eval latest_event=strftime(latest_event, "%F %T") | sort -count | `cs_sophos_core_restore_failed_filter`

`cs_sophos` type="Event::Smc::Renew*" $tkn_host$ $tkn_dhost$ $tkn_user$ | stats count, latest(_time) as latest_event, values(src_ip) as src_ip, values(suser) as user by host, dhost | eval latest_event=strftime(latest_event, "%F %T") | sort -count | `cs_sophos_expiration_messages_filter`

`cs_sophos` type="Event::Endpoint::HmpaExploitPrevented" $tkn_host$ $tkn_dhost$ $tkn_user$ | stats count, latest(_time) as latest_event, values(name) as description, values(src_ip) as src_ip, values(suser) as user by host, dhost | eval latest_event=strftime(latest_event, "%F %T") | sort -count | `cs_sophos_exploit_prevented`

`cs_sophos` type="Event::Endpoint::CoreDetection" $tkn_host$ $tkn_dhost$ $tkn_user$ | stats count, latest(_time) as latest_event, values(name) as description, values(src_ip) as src_ip, values(suser) as user by host, dhost | eval latest_event=strftime(latest_event, "%F %T") | sort -count | `cs_sophos_malware_detected`
